solution_line_template: Spike hunts {afternoon_evening_multiplier} * {morning_crickets} = <<{afternoon_evening_multiplier}*{morning_crickets}={afternoon_evening_crickets}>>{afternoon_evening_crickets} crickets in the afternoon and evening.
Hence, he hunts {morning_crickets} + {afternoon_evening_crickets} = <<{morning_crickets}+{afternoon_evening_crickets}={total_crickets_per_day}>>{total_crickets_per_day} crickets per day.
